properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_TYPE_CD = ?

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM (SELECT BOARD_NO,BOARD_TITLE,BOARD_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DT,'YYYY.MM.DD') AS "CREATE_DT" ,PROFILE_IMGE,MEMBER_NICK,BOARD_NAME FROM BOARD JOIN BOARD_TYPE USING(BOARD_TYPE_CD) JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE BOARD_TYPE_CD = ? ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC)A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
